com.lpoo.game.view.screens

Class WonMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lpoo.game.view.screens.OptionsMenu
      • com.lpoo.game.view.screens.WonMenu

  • public class WonMenu
extends OptionsMenu
    Class used to represent the pop up Menu that shows up when the User wins the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WonMenu

        WonMenu(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.viewport.Viewport viewport,
        Armadillo game,
        HudMenu hud)
        Won Menu Constructor. Takes as parameters a viewport, a game and a HUD Menu to call its superclass constructor.
        Parameters:
        viewport - The viewport that will be associated to the stage.
        game - The current game session.
        hud - The current Hud, associated to the current game being played.
